name: preconsciously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
happening in the part of your mind that contains feelings and thoughts that you are not consciously aware of, and from which particular memories or experiences can be recalled (= brought back into your mind): This memory system is believed to operate preconsciously throughout a person's life. We preconsciously create meaning out of experience by interpreting present data in terms of our past learning.
More examplesFewer examplesBehaviour often occurs preconsciously, based on information in your procedural memory.The spectators sense, preconsciously, the interplay of courtesy and discourtesy.
